subject: Basketball (College)
Socks
Fashion and Apparel
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: In a trend on full display at the N.C.A.A. men’s tournament, players increasingly cover their lower bodies, mostly out of fashion, partly out of protection, sometimes out of prudish modesty.
snippet: In a trend on full display at the N.C.A.A. men’s tournament, players increasingly cover their lower bodies, mostly out of fashion, partly out of protection, sometimes out of prudish modesty.
